snippet.title: Nestables - First Gameplay Preview
snippet.description:
Pre-Alpha gameplay footage of Nestables.

Nestables will allow gamers to collect, trade and breed 3D ‘Cubes’, each of which will have their own unique personality, traits and cosmetic features. Gamers will be able to interact with their Cubes through designing, creating and decorating their very own ‘Nest’ for them to live, play and work in. You can task your Cube with collecting resources to build improvements for the Nest or allow them to relax and play. With gamers able to create their own buildings, homes and decorations to bring their Cubes’ homes to life, each Nest will be unique and a representation of you.

You can find out more about our game here: https://www.nestables.co

Got any questions? Ask away in our Telegram: https://t.me/nestablesoffical
